base_description: Square, gray wall clock with minimalist design.
part_description: Features a circular clock face centered on a square base, with two simple hands indicating time. The clock face is metallic and minimalistic, lacking numbers or additional markings.
internal_interaction_description: The clock hands rotate around a central pivot point on the clock face. The minute hand moves in a continuous, smooth motion, while the hour hand shifts incrementally, both driven by an internal mechanism hidden behind the clock face.
external_interaction_description: The clock is designed to be mounted on a wall, providing a clear view of the time. It interacts with users who glance at it to check the time, and it requires occasional battery replacement to maintain functionality.
